name: Storage Hunters: Auction Battle Stars FREE
name_original: Storage Hunters: Auction Battle Stars FREE
description:
Have you ever been to an auction house? Have you ever taken part in an auction?

No worries if you have not! Download this game for FREE NOW and get the feel and excitement of taking part in a live auction!

How to Play:
It works just like a real time auction house. You can buy different items by bidding and sell them at a good profit.

Controls:
Just tap on the screen to play.

FEATURES:
• Quick, Fast and High Speed Game-Play
• Universal app, Play in HD on any IOS device including iPads
• Amazing Graphics
• Share your Scores on Facebook or Twitter

It’s an excellent game to have in your device. It gives you a chance to learn and take part in the auction process and understand it. Enjoy :)

Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think. Everyone here at Flowmotion Entertainment wants to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun mobile games available. Your Feedback is a big part in us being able to do this.

PS: Don't forget to visit us on Facebook :)
